scripts.install:all: npm run install:root && npm run install:server && npm run install:client
scripts.build: npm run build:server && npm run build:client
scripts.start:dev: concurrently "npm run start:server:dev" "wait-on tcp:3001 && npm run start:client:dev"
scripts.test:dev: concurrently "npm run server:dev:test" "wait-on tcp:3001 && npm run client:dev:test"
scripts.clean: npx rimraf node_modules server/node_modules client/node_modules server/dist client/dist server/tsconfig.tsbuildinfo package-lock.json server/package-lock.json client/package-lock.json
